About.Title: Software Engineer
About.Subtitle: Digital Craftsman
About.Description_A: I'm a software engineer with a strong focus on frontend development and user experience. My career has been shaped by a mix of hands-on experience, continuous learning, and a genuine passion for creating thoughtful digital solutions. I care about writing clean, efficient code and building interfaces that are both functional, elegant, and performance-oriented.
